alexian.name: Cluet
alexian.resume: I am a researcher in the Verso group at INRIA. I hold a PhD in Computer Science from the University of Paris-Sud. My initial research was on the design and optimization of query languages for object-oriented database systems. My current interests also include data integration, structured documents, bulk loading.

detail.formerly: VP. Engineering for O2 with Ardent Software in Versailles.
detail.diploma: ENPC, Paris and MSc Computer Sciences, Montreal

alexian.name: Grumbach
alexian.resume: Researcher in the Verso group at INRIA. Main interests: databases, especially language-related issues.

alexian.name: Issarny
alexian.resume: I got my PhD and my habilitation in computer science from the University of Rennes I in 1991 and 1997, respectively. Since 1993, I am an INRIA researcher within the Solidor research group, examining solutions to the construction of robust and efficient distributed systems. Since summer 1999, I am working at INRIA Rocquencourt and I am vice chair of the ACM SIGOPS .

alexian.name: Kanne
alexian.resume: 1992-1998 Computer Science diploma at RWTH Aachen, Germany since 1998 Ph.D. student/research assistant at Uni Mannheim, Germany (tutor: G. Moerkotte)

alexian.name: Libkin
alexian.resume: Researcher at the Computing Sciences Center at Bell Labs, Murray Hill and visitor at the Verso group at INRIA. Main interests: databases, especially language-related issues, and logic in CS.

alexian.name: Moerkotte
alexian.resume: 1987 Diploma in Computer Science (University of Karlsruhe) 1989 Doctoral Degree in Computer Science (University of Karlsruhe) 1994 Habiliation (University of Karlsruhe) 1994 Associate Professor at RWTH Aachen 1996 Full Professor at University of Mannheim diploma & Full Professor at University of Mannheim

alexian.name: Rousset
alexian.resume: I am a Professor od Computer Science at Paris-Sud University and a member of the "Institut Universitaire de France". After studies of Mathematics at Ecole Normale Superieure (Fontenay aux Roses), I received my PhD and "These d'Etat" diploma in Computer Science at Paris-Sud University in 1982 and 1988. Since 1989, I have been leading the Artificial Intelligence and Inference Systems (IASI) group in the Computer Science Research Laboratory (L.R.I) at Paris-Sud University. My research area is knowledge representation. Currently, I am involved in the PICSEL and GAEL projects that combine knowledge representation and database techniques for information integration and electronic commerce.

alexian.name: Segoufin
alexian.resume: INRIA researcher, VERSO group. Phd from Universite d'Orsay.

alexian.name: Vercoustre
alexian.resume: Anne-Marie Vercoustre is a Senior Research at Inria-Rocquencourt, where she has joined the Verso project two years ago. In 1996-1997 she has also been responsible for the Text-Base Information Management group at CSIRO-DMIS in Melbourne for 18 months. Her main research interest is in structured document management (SGML-like), XML storage, virtual documents specification, and the reuse of information from heterogeneous and distributed sources. She is also interested in the definition and use of metadata for resource discovery.
